itemInfo.itemDesc:
A soft bread with sausage placed inside. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 90 min
All Accuracy +8 for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Grilled Sausage
item.desc:
A sausage roasted to perfection. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +1 for 30 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Grilled Sausage
item.desc:
A sausage roasted to perfection. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +1 for 30 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Soft Bread
item.desc:
A grain dough that was allowed to ferment before baking. 

- Unique Effect: Max Stamina +100 for 30 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Cabbage
item.desc: A plump cabbage used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Stir-Fried Vegetables, Fried Vegetables, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Cabbage using Bare Hands.

item.name: Egg
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Soft Bread, Omelet, etc.

item.name: Smoked Sausage
item.desc:
A smoked sausage. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +1 for 45 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min
